channel.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
channel.description:
Hello.
After I got into the HEV Suit and heard the voice,[u] I didn't notice anything new[/u]. [u]It's still the original voice... Is this happening to me only[/u]? Am I crazy? (that maybe I don't notice any difference / the new voice isn't much different from the original one?)
[u]Can someone elucidate me[/u]? [u]I haven't heard any new voice[/u]. [u]I heard the same original voice (as in the 2012 mod version)[/u] o_O[u] Well[/u]?
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Minute lacerations detected… As usual…

Read full topic

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: Mr.F
item.description:
The voice itself is really good but the way it speaks is uncanny, it sounds all bitchy and passive-aggressive, I don’t know

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Swaggless:
Crypt:

Nostalgia?

…Wouldn’t that make them want to keep the old ones?

Possibly, but they couldn’t, and the new ones have a much higher level of quality, so it’s good.

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
Yeah, I was about to say I KNOW the voice is new. It’s VERY subtle, but I can hear it.
EXCELLENT work, guys!

What ultimately made you all decide to re-make the HEV lines?

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
They certainly don’t sound the same to me. The 2015 HEV voice is slightly higher-pitched.

Remastered versions of the original audio files or a filter of some sort, maybe?

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
It is a new voice, recorded by Kevin Sisk. It just sounds incredibly close to the original, which is why everyone is so impressed.

item.title: Regarding the new HEV Suit voice... WHERE IS IT?
item.dc:creator: Myth_Alex
item.description:
Hello.

After I got into the HEV Suit and heard the voice, I didn’t notice anything new. It’s still the original voice… Is this happening to me only? Am I crazy? (that maybe I don’t notice any difference / the new voice isn’t much different from the original one?)

Can someone elucidate me? I haven’t heard any new voice. I heard the same original voice (as in the 2012 mod version) o_O Well?

Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
